OOC: Here's my view.  So far as the Maxis and Preds not being evolved 
from the Autos and Decepts because they're smaller and weaker.  Well 
we're weaker than our ancestors and our arcitects can't reproduce the 
great pyramids no matter how hard they try.  That's 1 theory of 
Evolution.  Another states whoevers more sexually attractive will 
genetically survive.  You're not abot so don't say the Insecticons 
wouldn't have been good bedmates because opinions might vary even 
though the Insecticons were small and weak.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Hollywood Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Off scale? I'm not sure what that means, but it's probably an 
incorrect statement. G1 had bloopers, but none as bad as Beast Wars 
making Rattrap in the wrong form during Dinobot's cremation.
> 
> So, you have every transformer to ever exist? Ironic, I have a 
monster truck in my back yard that can actually transform into 
Unicron and you can ride around in him into outer space and even land 
on the moon like Neil Armstrong didn't! WHOOPEE!
> 
> Anyway, the Transmetal on the Transmetals is plastic. Easily 
damaged plastic. The only advantage it have over G1's metal is that 
it's less expensive. Well, it doesn't hurt as much when you drop it 
on your toe, too.
> 
> I wish I knew everything about G1. I do however, think I know 
enough to know what I'm talking about...
>
